:• '''867''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''300''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Home WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|https://eero.com/}} {{•}} [https://blog.eero.com/the-second-generation-of-eero/ Blog] {{see also|eero Home (A010001)}} ===Models=== *'''[[eero A010001]]''' - ''Home Wi-Fi Router'' :[[eero Home (A010001)]] *'''[[eero B010001]]''' - ''Wi-Fi Router/Access Point'' :[[eero Pro (B010001)]] - 2nd Generation *'''[[eero D010001]]''' - ''Wi-Fi Router/Access Point'' :[[eero Beacon (D010001)]] *'''eero B010301''' - ''Pro Wi-Fi System'' :2nd Generation (3x eero) *'''eero M010301''' - ''Home Wi-Fi System'' :2nd Gen (1x eero + 2x eero Beacon) *'''eero M010201''' - ''Home Wi-Fi System'' :2nd Gen (1x eero + 1x eero Beacon) ===Specifications=== *Wired connectivity: '''eero Beacon''': None ports :'''eero 2''': 2x GbE ports for WAN and/or LAN connectivity *Wireless connectivity: Thread 1.1 Border Router :802.11abgn/ac 2x2 MU-MIMO, BT 4.2 LE, Beamforming :'''eero Beacon''': Dual-band Wi-Fi radios (2.4/5.2 GHz) :'''eero 2''': Tri-band Wi-Fi radios (2.4/5.2/5.8 GHz) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32962-eero-home-wi-fi-system-reviewed ''eero Home Wi-Fi System reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.techhive.com/article/3204644/network-router/eero-home-wifi-system-2-review-beacons-make-this-system-even-easier-to-install.html ''eero Home WiFi System 2 review'' on '''TechHive'''] *[https://www.theverge.com/2017/6/28/15887698/eero-second-generation-mesh-router-review ''eero (2nd Gen) review'' on '''TheVerge'''] *[http://au.pcmag.com/review/48963/eero-2nd-generation ''eero (2nd Generation)'' on '''PCMag'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/eero-announces-its-next-generation.39632/ ''eero Announces Its Next Generation'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===See also=== ► [[List of Wireless Systems]] • [[Qualcomm SON]] • [https://www.pcmag.com/roundup/350795/the-best-wi-fi-mesh-network-systems Wi-Fi Mesh Network Systems] *[[ASUS Lyra]] (MAP-AC2200) - Home Wi-Fi System :AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Networking Wireless Router *[[Amped Wireless ALLY-R2100K]] - Whole Home Smart Wi-Fi System *[[Google Wifi (NLS-1304-25)]] - Home Wi-Fi System *[[EnGenius EnMesh (EMR3000v2)]] - AC1200 Whole Home Wi-Fi System *[[Linksys Velop (WHW03)]] - Tri-Band Whole Home Wi-Fi Mesh Node *[[Luma WRTQ-329ACN]] - Home Wi-Fi System *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - AC3000 Tri-Band Wi-Fi System *[[Plume A1A]] - Adaptive Wi-Fi Pod *[[Securifi Almond 3]] - Smart Home Wi-Fi System *[[TP-LINK Deco M5]] - AC1300 Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi System *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi HD]] - Home Mesh Wi-Fi System {{lowercase title}} __NOTOC__
